New Records: KL Rahul scored 97 runs, close to a century
Key Match Events: India won the match by 6 wickets
KL Rahul hit a six to win the match off Pat Cummins' final over
Virat Kohli and KL Rahul formed a crucial partnership
Australia were dismissed for 199 in 49.3 overs
The match was played at M.A. Chidambaram Stadium, Chennai
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised the team's performance and noted the importance of the win
Pat Cummins expressed disappointment over the drop of Virat Kohli early in the innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dew affected the pitch towards the end of the innings
India sent a clear message with their opening win in the tournament
Others: The match was India's opening game in the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023
Australia faced a tough challenge in their next match against South Africa
